n2o:sql.n2o:items-query: select :select from mc_step s join mc_case c on c.id = s.case_id join pci_patient p on p.id = c.patient_id join pim_individual i on i.id = p.id join pim_gender g on g.id = i.gender_id where not exists(select 1 from hsp_record h2 inner join mc_step s2 on s2.id = h2.id where s2.case_id = c.id and h2.previous_id = s.id) and :where
n2o:sql.n2o:count-query: select count(1) from mc_step s join mc_case c on c.id = s.case_id join pci_patient p on p.id = c.patient_id join pim_individual i on i.id = p.id join pim_gender g on g.id = i.gender_id where not exists(select 1 from hsp_record h2 inner join mc_step s2 on s2.id = h2.id where s2.case_id = c.id and h2.previous_id = s.id) and :where
